content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at (-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-18.0, -53.0)
- Chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at (-15.0, -51.0)
- Output chest at (-12.5, -50.5) containing 44 iron plates
- Output inserter at (-13.5, -50.5)

### Copper Mining and Smelting Complex at (-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Input chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Input inserter at (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-25.0, -59.0)
- Output chest at (-22.5, -58.5) containing 2 iron plates
- Output inserter at (-23.5, -58.5)

### Coal Mining Setup at (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41.0, -82.0)
- Storage chest at (41.5, -80.5) containing 252 coal
- Inserter at (41.5, -79.5)

### Power Generation System at (-4.5, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16.0)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe networks (water and steam systems)
- Electric pole network connecting various machines

### Automation Science Pack Production at (8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (8.5, 13.5)
- Output inserter at (10.5, 13.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5)
- Iron gear input system:
  - Chest at (9.5, 17.5)
  - Inserter at (9.5, 16.5)
- Copper plate input system:
  - Chest at (7.5, 17.5) containing 4 copper plates
  - Inserter at (7.5, 16.5)
- Transport belt system connecting components

ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Conflicts
- Check for existing entities before placing new ones at a location
- When placing inserters next to belts, ensure proper spacing and direction
- Consider using different directions or increasing spacing when placement fails

### Direction Related Errors
- Direction.NORTHWEST is not a valid direction, use only cardinal directions (UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT)

### Resource Management
- Ensure required items are in inventory before attempting to insert them into containers
- Verify fuel availability for burner devices
- Check if there is space in destination containers before attempting transfers

### Inserter Setup
- Ensure proper spacing between inserters and target entities
- Verify inserter pickup and drop positions are not blocked
- Place appropriate sink objects when inserters are waiting for space in destination

### Structure Planning
- Plan entity layouts considering space requirements for all components
- Account for entity dimensions when placing adjacent structures
- Consider the flow of materials when positioning input/output devices
